alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Baca and east central Las Animas Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 152 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 17 miles north of Kenton to 14 miles northeast of Kim. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield and Pritchett. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
